SELECT p.pno, p.uno, p.cate_no, p.p_title, p.p_content, p.p_price, p.p_quantity, p.p_regdate, p.p_updatedate, u.id AS sellerId FROM Products p LEFT JOIN Users u ON p.uno = u.uno WHERE p.pno = #{pno}

SELECT p.pno, p.uno, p.cate_no, p.p_title, p.p_content, p.p_price, p.p_quantity, p.p_regdate, p.p_updatedate, u.id AS sellerId FROM Products p LEFT JOIN Users u ON p.uno = u.uno WHERE p.uno = #{uno} ORDER BY p.p_regdate DESC
